name: Sophos Group plc
description: Sophos Group plc is a leading global cybersecurity company that provides innovative solutions to protect organizations against complex cyber threats. Founded in 1985 and headquartered in Abingdon, Oxfordshire, UK, Sophos specializes in endpoint security, network security, and unified threat management. The company offers a comprehensive range of products designed to safeguard businesses from malware, ransomware, phishing attacks, and other forms of cybercrime. Sophos is well known for its advanced artificial intelligence capabilities, which enhance threat detection and response times. With a focus on simplicity and usability, Sophos provides solutions that are accessible to organizations of all sizes, empowering them to effectively manage their cybersecurity posture. Sophos also offers a cloud-native security platform that integrates seamlessly with existing IT systems and provides real-time visibility and control. The company is dedicated to educating users about cybersecurity best practices and regularly publishes threat intelligence reports that help businesses stay informed about emerging threats. With a mission to deliver complete protection against the evolving landscape of cybersecurity threats, Sophos continues to innovate and expand its product offerings to meet the needs of its global customer base.
